metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Impact brings together our programs for accessibility, privacy, security, sustainability, and community as part of our mission to help build a better Internet.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Impact
relatedBlades.copy:
Our mission is to help build a better Internet. We believe a better Internet can be not only a force for good but also an engine of global sustainability.

Download our 2022 Impact Report:

relatedBlades.title: How we are helping build a better Internet

features.title: More accessible
features.description:
Cloudflare is making the Internet more accessible by improving reliability around the world.

- Learn more about free Cloudflare [services](https://www.cloudflare.com/plans/ "Cloudflare Plans") that are protecting and improving the performance of millions of web properties. 
- See how the Cloudflare network is expanding digital access [globally](https://blog.cloudflare.com/scaling-the-cloudflare-global/ "Cloudflare's Global Network") by delivering Internet content [more efficiently](https://blog.cloudflare.com/tag/internet-usage/ "Internet Usage"). Our network operates within approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} milliseconds of %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the Internet-connected population.
- Learn how Cloudflare is helping make routing Internet traffic more reliable by eliminating [hijacked routes](https://blog.cloudflare.com/is-bgp-safe-yet-rpki-routing-security-initiative/ "Is BGP Safe Yet? No. But we are Tracking it Closely").

features.title: More private
features.description:
Cloudflare is engineering privacy protections into the basic infrastructure of the Internet.

- Cloudflare is working with [leading technology companies](https://www.cloudflare.com/partners/technology-partners/ "Technology Partners") to secure web browsing by encrypting [DNS](https://blog.cloudflare.com/announcing-1111/ "Announcing 1.1.1.1") and improving [TLS](https://blog.cloudflare.com/encrypted-client-hello/ "Good-bye ESNI, hello ECH!"), as well as building privacy-oriented web services like [privacy-first analytics](https://blog.cloudflare.com/free-privacy-first-analytics-for-a-better-web/ "Free, Privacy First Analytics for a Better Web").  
- Cloudflare demonstrates our respect for privacy with [public commitments, reporting](https://www.cloudflare.com/transparency/ "Cloudflare Transparency Report"), and [audits](https://blog.cloudflare.com/announcing-the-results-of-the-1-1-1-1-public-dns-resolver-privacy-examination/ "Announcing the Results of the 1.1.1.1 Public DNS Resolver Privacy Examination").
- We are committed to providing built-in [data protection and privacy tools](https://www.cloudflare.com/privacyweek/ "Data Privacy and Compliance at Cloudflare") for every product in our portfolio.
- Cloudflare is building [quantum-resistant cryptography](https://blog.cloudflare.com/securing-the-post-quantum-world/ "Securing the Post-Quantum World") to help secure the future of privacy.

features.title: More secure
features.description:
Our network is designed to help band businesses, people, and organizations together to be stronger than malicious actors online.

- Learn about our free [unmetered DDoS mitigation](https://blog.cloudflare.com/unmetered-mitigation/ "Unmetered Mitigation: DDoS Protection without Limits") and [universal SSL encryption](https://blog.cloudflare.com/introducing-universal-ssl/ "Introducing Universal SSL"). 
- Learn how Cloudflare is protecting [civil rights and social justice organizations](https://blog.cloudflare.com/cyberattacks-since-the-murder-of-george-floyd/ "Cyberattacks Since the Murder of George Floyd") as well as [democratic elections](https://www.cloudflare.com/election-security/ "Cloudflare Election Security") online.  
- Cloudflare provides free services to protect vulnerable [nonprofits, journalists, independent media voices](https://www.cloudflare.com/galileo/ "Cloudflare Project Galileo"), [democratic elections](https://www.cloudflare.com/athenian/ "Cloudflare Athenian Project"), and [political campaigns](https://www.cloudflare.com/campaigns/ "Cloudflare for Campaigns") from cyber attacks.

features.title: Building together
features.description:
Cloudflare is part of a community that is striving to make the Internet a force for good.

- Learn how Cloudflare works with civil society to monitor trends, threats, and Internet shutdowns with [Cloudflare Radar](https://radar.cloudflare.com/ "Cloudflare Radar").
- Cloudflare works with the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children (NCMEC), Interpol, and nearly 60 other public and [private agencies](https://www.inhope.org/EN "INHOPE Home"), and has developed [free tools](https://blog.cloudflare.com/the-csam-scanning-tool/ "Introducing the CSAM Scanning Tool") to fight child sexual abuse material online. Learn about our guiding principles in [handling abuse reports](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/abuse-approach/).
- We collaborate with partner organizations to develop new Internet [standards and protocols](https://blog.cloudflare.com/tag/ietf/ "IETF") and address [Internet policy and governance](https://www.internetjurisdiction.net/ "Internet and Jurisdiction Policy Network") challenges.

relatedBlades.title: Impact Spotlight: Project Fair Shot
relatedBlades.copy:
[Project Fair Shot](https://www.cloudflare.com/fair-shot/ "Project Fair Shot") provides our new Waiting Room service for free for any government, municipality, hospital, pharmacy, or other organization responsible for distributing COVID-19 vaccines. It is open to eligible organizations around the world and will remain free until at least July 1, 2023, or longer if there is still more demand for appointments for the vaccine than there is supply.

In 2022, Project Fair Shot received a [Webby Award](https://winners.webbyawards.com/2022/apps-and-software/software-services-platforms/event-management/220961/cloudflares-project-fair-shot) in the category of People's Voice Winner.

relatedBlades.quote: Bottom line is Cloudflare saved lives today. Our county will forever be grateful for your participation in getting the vaccine to those that need it most in an elegant, efficient, and ethical manner.
relatedBlades.quoteTitle: Web Services Administrator, County of San Luis Obispo

relatedBlades.title: A better Internet helps protect the health of our planet
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare is committed to powering its network with 100% renewable energy and offsetting or removing all historical emissions associated with powering its network by 2025. 

To learn more about our greenhouse gas emissions and renewable energy purchases, see our [2021](https://cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/cyKi7QPKmmWoSnnKl7ogp/0b3a4438da311ce2315afa52013e5cee/Cloudflare_Emissions_Inventory_2021.pdf) and [2020](https://cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/2YzIeTtzSbyKkM4GsryP5S/62ce0dff98e92a142281a0b462ce4408/Cloudflare_Emissions_Inventory_-_2020.pdf) Carbon Emissions Inventory Reports.

As a member of the UN Global Compact, Cloudflare is committed to developing environmentally friendly technologies.

relatedBlades.title: A better Internet is built on respect for human rights
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare is committed to respecting human rights under the [UN Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights](https://www.ohchr.org/documents/publications/guidingprinciplesbusinesshr_en.pdf "UN Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights").

- Read our full [human rights](https://www.cloudflare.com/resources/images/slt3lc6tev37/fdLHB1OGp8ZWwzCTVlM0n/e0a42a032592ded778bda8c31c6747b1/BDES-2133_Impact-Week-Human-Rights-Policy.pdf "Human Rights Policy") policy.

As a [Global Network Initiative (GNI)](https://globalnetworkinitiative.org/ "Global Network Initiative") member, we are committed to helping to protect and advance freedom of expression and privacy online.

relatedBlades.title: How Cloudflare helps promote human rights online

features.title: Project Galileo
features.description: Project Galileo provides free security services to thousands of organizations working in the arts, human rights, civil society, journalism, and democracy.

features.title: Athenian Project
features.description: Election websites need to be fast, reliable, and secure — Athenian Project provides resources to help with all three goals.

features.title: Cloudflare for Campaigns
features.description: Cloudflare for Campaigns meets the essential needs of political campaigns, including securing candidates' web presence and safeguarding internal network and data.

features.title: Project Pangea
features.description: With Project Pangea, we can help communities solve the network challenges of routing traffic to and from the Internet.

relatedBlades.title: A better Internet is built by teams that are diverse and inclusive
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare is building a thriving, collaborative culture where we respect each other's work, listen to new ideas, and encourage each other's growth. 
- Learn more about [life at Cloudflare](https://blog.cloudflare.com/tag/life-at-cloudflare/ "Life at Cloudflare"), including our [employee resource groups](https://blog.cloudflare.com/tag/employee-resource-groups/ "Employee Resource Groups") and [diversity initiatives](https://blog.cloudflare.com/tag/diversity/ "Diversity"). 
- Cloudflare is using [returnship](https://blog.cloudflare.com/moving-forward-with-path-forward/ "Moving Forward with Path Forward") and [apprenticeship](https://www.aspeninstitute.org/programs/cybersecurity-technology-program/aspencyber-workforce-pipeline/ "Major Employers Commit to Build a Stronger Cybersecurity Workforce Pipeline") programs to help recruit and elevate diverse voices in cyber security.  
- Cloudflare has sponsored and collaborated with organizations and conferences like [AfroTech](https://afrotech.com/ "Afrotech"), [Grace Hopper Celebration](https://ghc.anitab.org/ "Grace Hopper Celebration"), [Women Who Code](https://www.womenwhocode.com/ "Women Who Code"), [Latinas in Tech](https://latinasintech.org/ "Latinas in Tech"), and more to further our diversity outreach and recruiting.

### "Having a workplace that allows our team to feel a sense of belonging and empowerment to do their best work is essential. That is why we have built corporate practices, policies, benefits, and an overall culture that is inclusive of everyone, including LGBTQIA+ folks. Achieving a perfect 100 score on the Human Rights Campaign's Corporate Equality Index, and being recognized alongside all of the other companies that have acted to create inclusive workplaces, is something we are proud of." 

__Jennifer (Jen) Taylor__ Cloudflare SVP, Chief Product Officer

relatedBlades.title: The United Nations Global Compact
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare is a signatory of the [UN Global Compact](https://www.unglobalcompact.org/what-is-gc/participants/141148-Cloudflare-Inc- "UN Global Compact - Cloudflare"). We are committed to the [UN Ten Principles](https://www.unglobalcompact.org/what-is-gc/mission/principles "United Nations Ten Principles") and to helping build a better Internet that supports global [sustainable development goals](https://sdgs.un.org/goals "The 17 Goals").  
- Read our [2021 Communication on Progress](https://cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/75Cj2XIGNbeO76Nzr3kTKV/adce49ba22c6c9c23a2e47effcf50205/2021-09-27._Cloudflare.COP.Final.pdf). 

![Sustainable Development Goals - 17 Icons](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/15Jc0Qk0pMouXhnkmIxMS7/ab92742afd0963bb7f236ae90847e530/SDG_17-Icons.svg)

### "Cloudflare Impact is founded in the belief that the Internet can be a positive force for sustainable development across the globe. We are on a mission to help build a better Internet, and are committed to using our environment, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives to do so." __Matthew Prince__ Co-Founder & CEO, Cloudflare
__Michelle Zatlyn__ President & COO, Cloudflare
